column3: What sort of training did you have in mind for <Highlight>StringParameter(1)</Highlight>, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>madam<Else/>sir</If>?
As expected, your race chocobo responded wonderfully to the training! I trust you will be pleased with the results.
What sort of training did you have in mind, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>madam<Else/>sir</If>?
Wait─this conversation is rather premature, is it not? You do not even have a race chocobo registered!
Race chocobos cannot be trained until they have been officially registered.
Hmmm, mayhap I spoke too soon. I fear your race chocobo would not benefit from further training at this time.
Additional training sessions will become available as your race chocobo increases in rank.
...Are we not forgetting something? A proper training session requires proper sustenance.
Training sessions cannot be conducted without the requisite feed, which can be purchased from the tack & feed trader at the race counter.
Forgive me, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>madam<Else/>sir</If>, but I must protest. In my expert opinion, your race chocobo will not benefit from such training.
Your race chocobo's <Unknown2F>FF1C022818FF13526163696E6743686F636F626F506172616DE8020103</Unknown2F> can no longer be increased.
